Package com.emse.spring.faircorp.api

Class BuildingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emse.spring.faircorp.api.BuildingController
  • @RestController
@CrossOrigin
@RequestMapping("/api/buildings")
public class BuildingController
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a REST controller for the building with Spring. It can get the buildings list, add a building, get a single building and delete a building.

                                                         java.lang.Long building_id)

        Parameters:
        building_id - the id of the building you want to get.
